title.narrative: 1.5. EARLY LEARNING

description.narrative: National capacity enhanced to ensure equitable, universal access to early learning, which contributes to Early Learning, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, especially the most deprived, access and utilize quality and equitable protection, education, health and nutrition services

participating-org.narrative: THE INSTITUTE OF EDUCATION OF THE REPUBLIC OF AZERBAIJAN

Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision or procurement of early-learning / pre-primary education learning materials
System strengthening - curricula and learning materials design (excluding early-learning / pre-primary)
System strengthening - risk informed programming, including climate, resilience, disaster, conflict, and emergency preparedness
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National capacity enhanced to ensure equitable, universal access to early learning

description.narrative: Access to the school readiness and community-based early learning programmes were further expanded at a national scale and quality of early education services and teaching practices were enhanced. Continued access to remote alternative preschool education services and parenting education was enabled during the COVID-19 pandemic | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021
